title: -- Renovated 3 Bed -- Modern Kitchen -- Dishwasher -- 9/1
posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts', '3 Bedroom and 1 Bath in Somerville / Sullivan Square $3,000', 'Somerville / Sullivan Square / Union Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#172521', 'Apartment Details', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Reference:', '#172521', 'Bath:', '1', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Bedrooms:', '3', 'Location:', 'Somerville/Sullivan Square', 'Apartment Summary', 'Recently gut renovated in 2015 to studs, stainless steel appliances, granite tops, one bedroom has an extra bonus room off of it could be used as an office.', 'little backyard for shared use between 3 units.', 'hard wood floors throughout (original refinished) modern kitchen and bathroom both spacious.', 'good storage.', 'Everything professionally painted in 2015.', 'new windows, new everything in 2015.', 'Easy walk to Sullivan Square orange line or Union Square.', 'Multiple bus lines very close by.', ' (Reference #172521)', 'Call the office @ 617-684-8000', 'Email : Hit Reply top left', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '617.684.8000', 'Please mention reference #', '172521', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
